    • Method Detail

      • fetchAndMerge

        void fetchAndMerge(URI codeStyleBaseUri,
                 String prefsFile,
                 File destDir)
                   throws IOException
        Fetch and merge the preferences file.
        Parameters:
        codeStyleBaseUri - base URI
        prefsFile - prefs file being processed
        destDir - destination directory containing the prefs file.
        Throws:
        IOException - I/O error

      • openPreferenceStream

        InputStream openPreferenceStream(URI codeStyleBaseUri,
                               String prefsFile)
                                 throws IOException
        Create an input stream pointing to the prefs file inside the code style base URI. The caller is responsible for closing the stream.
        Parameters:
        codeStyleBaseUri - code style base URI
        prefsFile - prefs file to look up
        Returns:
        stream or null if the target is not available.
        Throws:
        IOException - I/O error

      • openStream

        InputStream openStream(String url)
                       throws IOException
        Create an input stream pointing to the URL. The caller is responsible for closing the stream.
        Parameters:
        url - url to fetch
        Returns:
        stream or null if the target is not available.
        Throws:
        IOException - I/O error
